SVBPH Delhi Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 03 Senior Resident and Junior Resident Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 16, 2025, 11:14 IST
 Sardar Vallabh Bhai Patel Hospital
 3 Jobs |  Posted On : 16-Aug-2025 |  Delhi |  Salary : 56,100 to 67,700




FOLLOW

Sardar Vallabh Bhai Patel Hospital, Delhi (SVBP) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 03 Senior Resident and Junior Resident Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, DNB, Diploma, and BDS can grab this chance and apply for the SVBPH Delhi Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the interview at the address mentioned below.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Delhi.

SVBPH Delhi Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Senior Resident	01	MBBS, DNB, Diploma
Junior Resident 	02	BDS

Age Limit for the SVBPH Delhi Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 45 years.

Selection Process for the SVBPH Delhi Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the SVBPH Delhi Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 56,100 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 67,700 /- per month.

Application fee for the SVBPH Delhi Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the SVBPH Delhi Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Junior Resident notification 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Then, attend the interview along with the application form and required documents at the address given below.

Venue

Conference Hall, 2nd Floor, Administration Block, Sardar Vallabh Bhai Patel Hospital, Delhi

Important Dates

Date of Walk-in-Interview	21-08-2025
Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here

Join on Telegram	Join Now
